Document.name: $__ctor
Document.summary: Create an encoder, specifying what bytes will never appear in the data to compress.
Document.param: A filter array If existingBytes[x] == true, it means x will possibly appear. If existingBytes[x] == false, it means x will never appear.
Document.remark: The behavior is undefined, if existingBytes[x] == false, but byte x is actually in the data to compress.
